entity.name: Hillary Clinton
entity.description: Former First Lady of the United States Hillary Clinton

text:
@HillaryClinton Teachers are essential workers.
We have police officers and firefighters as well as many other government workers who have been working during this entire covid-19 crisis. Workers in grocery stores I have worked the entire time.
Most teachers are young.
Time to go back to work.
